name: Chaos Caster
description:
Within a pocket dimension a rift of chaos has formed, spilling forth creatures that threaten the natural balance of the world. Can you harness the threat of chaos and use its power to drive back its disruptive forces?

 Chaos caster was made for the 2021 Brackeys Game Jam. 

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Click

Grazing bullets will absorb their chaos and increase your power for a time.
